title: Lesser Restoration Potion
summaries: The Lesser Restoration Potion is a potion that has the effects of both the Lesser Healing Potion and Lesser Mana Potion.

On the <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader version</linked>, they are no longer craftable and have instead been replaced by the <linked>Restoration Potion</linked>. However, they can still be found inside <linked>Shadow Chests</linked> in <linked>The Underworld</linked>.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, they are removed partially, and are replaced with <linked>Restoration Potions</linked> when cheated through inventory editors.
